body: { "text":"Indent Number : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{indentNumber}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Indent Date : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{indentDate}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Indenting Store Name : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{storeName}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Indent Status : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{indentStatus}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Indent Purpose : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{indentPurpose}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Inventory Type : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{inventoryType}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}
{ "text":"Narration : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] , "style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{narration}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"colSpan":3, "style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Expected Delivery Date : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{deliveryDate}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Created By : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{createdBy}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"Designation : ", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}, { "text":"{{designation}}", "border":[ false, false, false, false ] ,"style": "tm-cols-table"}

{ "text":"Sr.No.", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Material Name", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table" }, { "text":"Material Description", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"UOM Name", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Indent Purpose", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Work Details/Remark", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Required Quantity", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}

{{#variable1}}[ "{ "text":"{{srNo}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{materialName}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table-value" }, { "text":"{{materialDescription}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{uomName}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{indentPurpose}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{workDetailsRemark}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{requiredQuantity}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}" ]{{/variable1}}

{ "text":"Date", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Updated By", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table" }, { "text":"Status", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Current Assignee", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}, { "text":"Comments", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table"}

{{#variable2}}[ "{ "text":"{{date}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{updatedBy}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ], "style": "tm-sub-table-value" }, { "text":"{{status}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{currentAssignee}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}, { "text":"{{comments}}", "border":[ true, true, true, true ] ,"style": "tm-sub-table-value"}" ]{{/variable2}}
